A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left the theater thinking\, but the longer I've thought about the movie\, I've loved it more. It may be my favorite Star Wars movie of all time. It is strange\, it feels weird\, and it is not at all what you expect. But it has incredible\, emotional moments and it feels as if this is the full potential of Star Wars. Unlike so many blockbusters this movie has a story\, not just a plot. It has a message and it has depth. It's wonderful.
